channel.title: patterns on Hybrid Cloud Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in patterns on Hybrid Cloud Patterns

item.title: Multi-cluster GitOps with Provisioning
item.description: Multi-cluster GitOps with Provisioning Introduction Validated Patterns are an opinionated GitOps environment that lowers the bar for those creating repeatable and declarative deployments.

item.title: Push or Pull?
item.description: Push or Pull? Strategies for Large Scale Technology Change Management on the Edge What is Technology Change Management? There is a segment of the technology industry dedicated to keeping track of what is changing in an IT environment, when and how.

item.title: Ansible Edge GitOps
item.description: Validated Pattern: Ansible Edge GitOps Ansible Edge GitOps: The Why and What As we have been working on new validated patterns and the pattern framework, we have seen a need and interest from the community in expanding the use cases covered by the framework to include other parts of the portfolio besides OpenShift.
